tool_description: Music Links is an API that aims to find a given track, album or artist in many music platforms.
name: MusiclinkssApi
title: MusiclinkssApi

api_list.name: Search by url
api_list.description: Given a **Spotify url**, this returns details about *tracks*, *albums* and *artists*.

api_list.name: Get artist's albums
api_list.description: Given a **Spotify url**,  returns basic details about albums of artist.

api_list.name: Search by query
api_list.description: Given a **query** and **type** of element, this returns details about *tracks*, *albums* and *artists*.
